Author: wrappedinlust
Text: Thanks for your comment, you have some valid points! Yes, i did tell my dietitian, we are working together in understanding food in a non guilty way. She is truly awesome.

Author: itsunusualbut
Text: hey! that sounds really stressful that this cycle started up for you around january, binging and restricting and all the negative thoughts and feelings that can come with it is a lot to put your body and mind through and i'm sorry you're dealing with it right now <3   honestly that sounds like a very strange and unsupportive way for your therapist to respond to you telling him that. i feel my first reaction, if i were him, would be concern for your wellbeing because not eating for weeks at a time is definitely not an ideal place to be for anyone, at any time. it sounds like it was really emotional to tell him that, and i can imagine it would be confusing and maybe hurtful to hear him respond in that way.  it sounds like you had really good healthy goals for yourself when you first started seeing your dietician. do you think you would consider telling them what has been going on and asking for some help? there is a chance they will be more informed around this than your therapist and can help you find something that is going to help you get out of this difficult place.   &#x200B;
